page.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

page_size.description: Number of results to return per page.

search_precise.description: Disable fuzziness for the search query.

search_exact.description: Mark the search query as exact.

parent_platforms.description: Filter by parent platforms, for example: `1,2,3`.

developers.description: Filter by developers, for example: `1612,18893` or `valve-software,feral-interactive`.

publishers.description: Filter by publishers, for example: `354,20987` or `electronic-arts,microsoft-studios`.

genres.description: Filter by genres, for example: `4,51` or `action,indie`.

tags.description: Filter by tags, for example: `31,7` or `singleplayer,multiplayer`.

creators.description: Filter by creators, for example: `78,28` or `cris-velasco,mike-morasky`.

updated.description: Filter by an update date, for example: `2020-12-01,2020-12-31`.

platforms_count.description: Filter by platforms count, for example: `1`.

metacritic.description: Filter by a metacritic rating, for example: `80,100`.

exclude_collection.description: Exclude games from a particular collection, for example: `123`.

exclude_game_series.description: Exclude games which included in a game series.

ordering.description: Available fields: `name`, `released`, `added`, `created`, `updated`, `rating`, `metacritic`. You can reverse the sort order adding a hyphen, for example: `-released`.
